Title: Tape 3, Side A
Writer: Julia Bicknell (teleplay by), Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Hannah and Clay connect at the school dance, but a crass rumor ruins the mood. Clay takes Courtney to visit Hannah's grave.
